Installation

  1. Install the dword library
pip install dword
  1. Make sure you have ffmpeg installed.

Quick start

Start by logging into your DeepWord account and generating API keys

Use these keys to login to your account in Python

{% raw %} 
acc = DeepWord(API_KEY, SECRET_KEY)

login successful
{% endraw %}

That's it!!! Now you can start creating videos. We have many options for choosing a video or an audio. The process for each is shown below.
